metadata.synopsis: A one-shot AD that is played between Arfur the toymaker and a Rivington Rats leader Zenovia after the thugs chased out refugees from his house.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, 8; 49; -98Talk to Arfur and proceed through the dialog, eventually picking up the option that you don't care (not "leave") ORor WYR_MerchantsHouse_ThugsChasingOutand wait for the thugs to finish their job.

0.speaker: Zenovia Dawg
0.text: Job done. Whatever's left is yours to sort out.
